detail_description: In Bento Goncalves, a city with a rich heritage, the Parque Temático Epopeia Italiana stands out as a must-visit attraction. This indoor theme park brings to life the story of Italian immigrants who arrived in southern Brazil in 1875 through a 45-minute historical and cultural reenactment.
name: Parque Temático Epopeia Italiana
address: R. Visc. de São Gabriel, 507 - Cidade Alta, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95700-000, Brazil

excerpt: Spacious winery amid rolling hills featuring scenic beauty, wine tastings & historical tours.
detail_description: Miolo Winery is a renowned and spacious winery located amidst picturesque rolling hills, offering visitors the chance to indulge in wine tastings and historical tours. As the largest winery in Brazil, it provides an exceptional experience with informative guided tours that delve into the details of winemaking. The knowledgeable staff ensures a pleasant visit, while the option for wine tasting allows guests to receive credit at the store.
name: Miolo Winery
address: RS-444, 21 - Vale dos Vinhedos, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95711-000, Brazil

excerpt: Sprawling historic winery with tours, tastings & special events, plus charming inns & a restaurant.
detail_description: Casa Valduga Vinhos Finos Ltda. is a renowned historic winery in Bento Goncalves, offering tours, tastings, and special events. The property also features charming inns and a restaurant, providing guests with the opportunity to dine, enjoy wine, and relax without having to leave the premises. Staying at the vineyard also offers discounts for tastings and courses at Casa Valduga.
name: Casa Valduga Vinhos Finos Ltda.
address: Via Trento, 2355 - Vale dos Vinhedos, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95701-720, Brazil

name: Vinícola Salton
address: R. Mario Salton, 300 - Distrito de Tuiuty, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95710-000, Brazil

detail_description: Vinícola Torcello, located in Bento Gonçalves, offers a stunning setting surrounded by vineyards and provides one of the best views in the region. Visitors can observe part of the wine production process behind the tasting room and enjoy detailed explanations about each wine while sampling sparkling wines and other varieties. The winery's approach to winemaking emphasizes wisdom and sensitivity to extract the quality and flavor from the grapes.
name: Vinícola Torcello
address: ERS 444, km 16 Vale dos Vinhedos Merlot, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95701-600, Brazil

excerpt: Interactive sheep farm where children & adults feed, milk & shear on-site animals alongside tours.
name: Parque da Ovelha
address: Rodovia, Linha Palmeiro, 400 - Distrito de São Pedro, RS, 95714-000, Brazil

name: Winery Cave Stone
address: RS-444 - Vale dos Vinhedos, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95711-000, Brazil

name: Lidio Carraro Vinícola Boutique
address: RS-444, KM 21 - Vale dos Vinhedos, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95711-000, Brazil

name: House of Yerba Mate
address: Linha Palmeiro, 190 Estrada, São Pedro, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95700-000, Brazil

name: PIZZATO Vines and Wines (Pizzato Winery Ltd.)
address: Via dos Parreirais, S/N - Santa Lucia, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95711-000, Brazil

detail_description: Vinícola Almaúnica is a renowned vineyard known for its top-notch syrahs and Quatro Castas blends. Visitors can enjoy a friendly atmosphere with the owner often present in the tasting room, offering glasses of their spectacular wines against the backdrop of gorgeous vineyard views. The winery offers guided tours that provide insight into their winemaking process, allowing guests to learn about the origins and elaboration of their wines and sparkling wines.
name: Vinícola Almaúnica
address: RS 444 KM 17,35, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95701-600, Brazil

detail_description: Wines Larentis Ltda is a winery that values quality and has been producing its wines using top-notch equipment and investing in new cultivation and production techniques. They produce around 100,000 bottles per harvest and offer tastings of 5 or 12 labels. Visitors can also enjoy activities such as picnics in the vineyards and tastings of aged wines.
name: Wines Larentis Ltda
address: Via Trento - Vale dos Vinhedos, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95711-000, Brazil

detail_description: Vinícola Cainelli is an exceptional winery that offers a remarkable experience. Their Vindima event is truly extraordinary, showcasing their excellent preparation to cater to tourists. The ambiance makes visitors feel right at home, accompanied by superb wine and delightful Italian cuisine complemented by the enchanting sounds of Italian music. Highly recommended, one cannot overlook the significant impact made by the present owners.
name: Vinícola Cainelli
address: 202,6 BR-470, s/n, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95700-000, Brazil

detail_description: The winery Winery Michele Carraro in the vineyards valley is a family-run establishment known for its exceptional labels and meticulous production process. Their reserve wines, including Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, and Tannat, are outstanding, as well as their sparkling wines. The level of service provided is unmatched, reflecting the care and dedication put into every aspect of the winemaking process.
name: Winery Michele Carraro
address: Rodovia RST 444, s/n, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95701-600, Brazil

detail_description: Vinícola Dom Bernardo in Vale dos Vinhedos is known for its exceptional wines that are unlike those found in larger wineries. The family-run establishment offers a delightful tasting experience, making you feel at home while chatting with friends. The service provided by Mateus is top-notch and the overall visit comes highly recommended. This winery stands out for its wonderful wines, making it a must-visit destination for wine enthusiasts looking to explore the unique flavors of Vale dos Vinhedos.
name: Vínicola Dom Bernardo
address: R. das Videiras, 3051 - Garibaldi, RS, 95720-000, Brazil

name: Parque Casa na Árvore
address: Estr. Joaquim Cantelli - São Pedro, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95700-000, Brazil

detail_description: Nestled amidst the picturesque vineyards of Bento Gonçalves, Vinícola e Pousada Peculiare offers a stunning and modern retreat for travelers seeking an immersive wine experience. This charming guesthouse features beautifully decorated accommodations with expansive windows that showcase breathtaking valley views, along with luxurious amenities like a hot tub and dining area. Guests can indulge in delightful culinary offerings at the on-site restaurant, where Chef Alvaro serves up homemade bread that is both warm and crunchy—a true treat to start your day!
name: Vinícola e Pousada Peculiare
address: Linha Leopoldina, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95700-000, Brazil

detail_description: The Igreja Matriz Cristo Rei, built in a modern Gothic style, was completed in 1954 after five years of construction. Its interior features a soaring 40-meter-high nave and three altars. Inside one of the side aisles is the holy water font, adorned with symbolic angelic figures holding the basin above which the spigot releases the blessed water. Situated in Praca das Rosas, this church boasts grape-themed decorations throughout its interior.
name: Igreja Matriz Cristo Rei
address: Av. Dr. Antônio Casagrande, 27-89 - Cidade Alta, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95700-000, Brazil

detail_description: Cavas do Vale Winery is a family-owned vineyard that produces a limited quantity of wine with modest facilities compared to other prominent wineries in the region. Despite this, their friendly and dedicated service during tastings sets them apart. One distinguishing feature of the winery is their collection of older vintages, such as 2005 and 2010. While some may prefer young wines, Cavas do Vale Winery particularly shines with its exceptional rose variety, which exhibits unique characteristics.
name: Cavas do Vale Winery
address: RS-444, Km 17,7, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95700-000, Brazil

detail_description: Cave do Sol offers a unique experience compared to traditional grape harvest programs in the Serra Gaucha region. While other wineries offer grape picking and traditional stomping accompanied by music and food, Cave do Sol takes a different approach. Visitors can enjoy a visit with the winemaker, Alex, who is described as knowledgeable and pleasant. The place itself is beautiful with an interesting family history.
name: Cave do Sol
address: RS 444 km 20, 7, Bento Gonçalves - RS, 95711-000, Brazil
